messages.subject: Re: HELO
messages.body:
Good Day, 


Am Aisha Gaddafi daughter of late Colonel Gaddafi the Libyan leader.I am contacting you to assist me in removing the sum of sixty five million USA dollars being deposited with a security company in UAE Dubai.


The funds was deposited with a security company in my name and as a matter of fact, me my only surviving son manage to escape with the help of a security guard on duty that fateful day, I am presently into hiding in a refugee camp between the border of Chad and Nigria because I know that the regime of my father has collapse after his death.



Please for your kind assistance I will offer you 30% of the total sum, all the legal documentation concerning the deposit are with me, I will issue power of attorney making you the new beneficiary of the deposit so that the security company can release the consignment to you. 


Once you successfully secure the consignment from the security company an arrangement would be made for disbursement. 


May Allah grant you the heart to assist me and my only son in this our trial period, please never you abandon me with my son just because we are Arabs, but I want to assure you that honesty and trust must remain our bond. 


Get back with your details so that we can proceed without delay because l am here without help from no one. 


Aisha Gaddafi
messages.raw:
AISHA GADDAFI

Subject: Re: HELO
From: aishagadaffi9771@gmail.com
To: xxxxxx
Date: Tue, 22 Dec 2015 14:25:41 +0100

Good Day,

Am Aisha Gaddafi daughter of late Colonel Gaddafi the Libyan leader.I am contacting you to assist me in removing the sum of sixty five million USA dollars being deposited with a security company in UAE Dubai.

The funds was deposited with a security company in my name and as a matter of fact, me my only surviving son manage to escape with the help of a security guard on duty that fateful day, I am presently into hiding in a refugee camp between the border of Chad and Nigria because I know that the regime of my father has collapse after his death.

Actually the Omani government is hosting her, all expenses paid, so don't bring out the violins just yet.

Please for your kind assistance I will offer you 30% of the total sum, all the legal documentation concerning the deposit are with me, I will issue power of attorney making you the new beneficiary of the deposit so that the security company can release the consignment to you.

Once you successfully secure the consignment from the security company an arrangement would be made for disbursement.

May Allah grant you the heart to assist me and my only son in this our trial period, please never you abandon me with my son just because we are Arabs, but I want to assure you that honesty and trust must remain our bond.

Get back with your details so that we can proceed without delay because l am here without help from no one.

Aisha Gaddafi

The old Dictator's Widow format! basically the Dead Bank Customer with political window-dressing. For the new reader, here's the M.O. (key phrases highlighted above):
- my late husband (father, boss...) left some money ( hidden, deposited, stored ) somewhere
- please collect it for me (for some reason I can't collect it myself)
- you must pay some fees to collect the (imaginary) money, a money order will do nicely

messages.body:
On Tue, Dec 22, 2015 at 6:51 AM


Hello Aisha,
Where is Nigria?

 Your proposal seems interesting at first view. 
 As a matter of fact, I travel to Dubai on Business every once in a while. 
 Is there anything I can do in person when I am there? 

Sincerely,
Ragnar Lothbrok
messages.raw:
RAGNAR LOTHBROK

On Tue, Dec 22, 2015 at 6:51 AM

Hello Aisha,
Where is Nigria?

Your proposal seems interesting at first view.

As a matter of fact, I travel to Dubai on Business every once in a while.

Is there anything I can do in person when I am there?

Sincerely,
Ragnar Lothbrok

messages.body:
Dnia 22 grudnia 2015 17:55 Aisha Gaddafi napisa.(a):



My Dear ,


Al Salam Alaykum to you. May Allah guide you for
helping me in this transaction. I need an ALLAH sent like you as i was
searching for who will help me as i am between Chad republic and Nigeria in a
refugee camp which is like a hell on earth being here. my son is sick and i
need to find a good life out from here and also think of a partner who i can
confide in and jointly have a lucrative investment in your country as i am a
bit relieved for you understanding my present predicament in my last long
email.I am a woman of integrity with due respect i promise you in the name of
Allah in his infinite mercy who have divinely made us to meet as our creator
who have made us to be honest to each other in this transaction.


Please dear reconfirmed your full details information as follows-


1; Your Full Name
2; Your direct telephone.
3; Your age
4; Contact address
5; Occupation
6; Any form of your ID for identification purposes.



However i will use this information's to procure the
needed documentation with the security vault in Dubai UAE in your name as i
have legitimately secured the document that you will use for the change of
ownership making you the BONA-FIDE owner of the fund .as i will notify them to
make you the new beneficiary to the funds. Attached is the CERTIFICATE OF
DEPOSIT and deposit slip and also my pictures for your perusal , In addition to
that I urge you in the name of Allah to be honest and truthful as i am assuring
you that this transaction is legal and hitch free.


More importantly i want to sound it loud and clear to
you that this transaction is protected, honest, real,legal,moral and legitimate
and additionally it has a proven evidence. On this note, you must also assure
me that you will not betray me when you receive this fund finally


I wait for urgent reply.


Love you always
Aisha.
messages.raw:
AISHA GADDAFI

Love you always
Aisha.

messages.body:
On Tue, Dec 22, 2015 at 9:21 AM
 


Dear Aisha,


I took the liberty of looking you up on the internet, and I see that you are a widow since 2011.


Let me tell you a little bit about myself: my name is Ragnar, I own a small factory in Sweden, and I am 43, so only 5 years older than you, and divorced.


I thought about your proposal, and I think I may have something even better to offer you.


I know you will have to think about this for a while, so take your time in answering me.


I saw on Wikipedia that you are an educated, intelligent, and may I say quite beautiful woman.


Therefore, I am proposing to you a marriage of convenience.


I could get you a fiancee visa, to bring you and your son to Sweden.  We could then get married, I would adopt your son, and we could either live in my nice house, or we could use some of your money to buy a bigger mansion.  You would have peace and security in beautiful Sweden. More importantly for you: your son would have a good education and a real future here in Sweden.


As for the money, we could either manage it jointly, or split it 50/50 into separate bank accounts.


What do you think, lovely Aisha?
Ragnar


P.S.: you do have beautiful eyes
messages.raw:
RAGNAR LOTHBROK

As for the money, we could either manage it jointly, or split it 50/50 into separate bank accounts.

What do you think, lovely Aisha?
Ragnar

P.S.: you do have beautiful eyes

You have spoken well and sequel to your proposal, let

messages.body:
On Tue, Dec 22, 2015 at 1:07 PM, lothbrokragnar <xxxxxxxxxxxx> wrote:


Sweet, lovely Aisha,


How old is your son, which I am to adopt, and what is his name?  Is he in
better health now? Do you need money for medication? Can you send his picture
too?


Attached is my picture.



Here is some info about myself:


I own a factory which makes pork products.  We use the entire animal so as not
to waste anything:


- dried pork meat for military rations
- a lubricant for weapons and ammunitions made from
the pork's fat
- women's trousers made from pork leather
- we use the leftover bones to make shirt buttons and children's
toys


Personal info:


1. Name: Ragnar Loðbrók
2. I do not have a fax or phone, I live alone in the forest of Ragnarök
3. Age: 43
4 Contact address:
666 Veðrfölnir väg
64-196 Rök
Östergötlands län
Sweden


5: Occupation: owner of a pork product factory


I do not own a scanner; I will have to get my ID scanned next time I travel to
town.


If we are going to get married, you must tell me more about yourself: what
books do you read? What are your hobbies? Do you like chocolate? Can you cook
well? I hear people in Libya eat a lot of onions.


I cannot wait until your next e-mail to find out more about you.


With love,
Ragnar

messages.body:
My Dear Ragnar Loðbrók,
I am  in receipt of your e-mail ,  your personal information's and  your picture but please try and send any form of your ID  which i requested from you for identification  and data base  records .  I sincerely wish  you are for real and good. I am greatly delighted to know about your honesty   and i feel greatly persuaded that you are very caring too. Thank you also for your love and I really know that you care.





Actually   you are aware that i am  still in a refugee camp and my situation here is  unbearable   coupled with my sons ill health which is really  very devastating  and unimaginable. so help me in prayer  that Almighty  Allah see me through and heal my son. I  have an appointment with  the doctor  today in the afternoon  because of  his surgical operation which to take effect in the evening.


However   i am very happy you are a honest person like me and you had feeling of love so i want  you to assure me that you will be honest  to me and that  you will not  betray me when you received this fund. and i will implore you to  think of a lucrative  project or venture that we can invest our money into that can be  profitable .


Additionally i have  forwarded  your information to the security  Vault  to  authenticate  a change of ownership to your favor  making you the  BONA-FIDE owner  of the said  fund .That   means that as soon as the authentication is completed, you will automatically  become the owner of this fund  and i will henceforth  be looking up to you to update me in any development from the SECURITY  VAULT IN DUBAI.


And also i have asked the  SECURITY VAULT LAWYER to prepare power of attorney and Authorization letter to your favor.



More importantly  at this juncture ,be informed that you will be forwarding all your correspondence with the  SECURITY VAULT to me   to enable us  have  a hitch free transaction.


Below is the information of the security company, contact them  immediately  and keep me updated.


UNION  SECURITY VAULT
UNITED ARAB  EMIRATES  DUBAI
CONTACT PERSON-----  Abdul  Mohammed
E-mail :  unionvaultsecurities@outlook.com
Email  :customercare@unionsecurityvault.org
TEL:+971504150373


Please use the attached certificate  which I sent to you in my previous email as a reference on your contact with the security company and establish yourself as the new fund  beneficiary and owner  for them to  expedite action in your  favor and also have a scheduled  appointment on how the consignment would released to to you.



Until   I receive  your mail  on your discussion with the security company. Thanks you for your co-operation.


Find the attach picture of my son in the hospital for your perusal.


With love from   Aisha

Additionally i have forwarded your information to the security Vault to authenticate a change of ownership to your favor making you the BONA-FIDE owner of the said fund .That means that as soon as the authentication is completed, you will automatically become the owner of this fund and i will henceforth be looking up to you to update me in any development from the SECURITY VAULT IN DUBAI.

And also i have asked the SECURITY VAULT LAWYER to prepare power of attorney and Authorization letter to your favor.

Dear reader: a compliant victim will dutifully contact the 'security company' Lad, who will try to close the deal by charging 'fees' for the various 'legal' documents and services. The first scammer - aka the 'guyman' or 'catcher' - and the second Lad will work on the victim to extract a money order.
But this is Ragnar they're dealing with...

More importantly at this juncture ,be informed that you will be forwarding all your correspondence with the SECURITY VAULT to me to enable us have a hitch free transaction.

Below is the information of the security company, contact them immediately and keep me updated.

UNION SECURITY VAULT
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES DUBAI
CONTACT PERSON----- Abdul Mohammed
E-mail : unionvaultsecurities@outlook.com
Email :customercare@unionsecurityvault.org
TEL:+971504150373

Please use the attached certificate which I sent to you in my previous email as a reference on your contact with the security company and establish yourself as the new fund beneficiary and owner for them to expedite action in your favor and also have a scheduled appointment on how the consignment would released to to you.

The 'certificates' are mocked up on inkjet printers, with lavish garish colors and fonts, or official forms acquired through theft or bribery.

Until I receive your mail on your discussion with the security company. Thanks you for your co-operation.

Find the attach picture of my son in the hospital for your perusal.

With love from Aisha

messages.body:
... and again from "Aisha"....


Dnia 23 grudnia 2015 5:48 Aisha Gaddafi napisa.(a):


Dear  Ragnar,
I was  very glad to  receive your email . I was Born  Aug. 10th 1976


My husband was reportedly killed in the 26 July 2006 bombing of Gaddafi's compound.


I  am a lawyer by profession and I acquired a doctorate degree in law.


I have three children two boys and a girl but a boy and a girl died in the war too.


Now I have only a boy who is now in the hospital receiving treatment whose picture I attached in my last email.


It is difficult for me to forget but Allah is my comforter, my refuge and my fortress.


I  am a writer, I write books on law. I like swimming too.


I am a honest person, I believe in the truth and honesty, and love.


Please make sure you contact union security vault  Dubai to enable us get started.


Love you always Aisha

AISHA GADDAFI

messages.body:
23 grudnia 2015 14:15


Aisha baby,


I dreamt about you last night.  You said you like swimming; do you have any sexy pictures of you in bikini that you could send me?


So you are a baby-making machine. Unfortunately, my last wife was barren.  Can we have many children together?


I erased the last e-mails by mistake, including the one with the people I am supposed to contact.  Can you send that to me again?


Actually, if you want to save some time, maybe you could just forward them all my information which you already have.


The reason for this is that I am leaving now to go spend a few days with my parents to spend Christmas and the feast of Saint Loki with them.  They are very old, they do not have internet, and live far from the city.


So, I will not be able to check my e-mail for a few days.


Enjoy your Christmas!


Love,
Ragnar
